name: Vault Radar
description: Secret detection and exposure monitoring — find leaked credentials across repos, CI logs, and documents

tools: get_exposure — Get exposure details (type, location, severity)

setup_steps: 1. Enable Vault Radar in HCP (HashiCorp Cloud Platform)
2. Connect data sources (GitHub, GitLab, Confluence, etc.)
3. Create a service principal: HCP → Access Control → Service Principals
security_notes: Vault Radar shows metadata about secrets — not the actual secret values
HCP service principal should have Viewer role only
Rotate HCP credentials on a schedule
Pair with Vault MCP for detect → rotate workflow
